Headline: Sony's active noise-canceling headphones are down to their lowest price ever on Amazon
Article_Body: If you've been itching to try active noise-canceling headphones, listen to this: Right now on Amazon, Sony's Bluetooth WH-1000XM3 over-ear headphones are down to an all-time low price. Sony WH-1000XM3 Noise Cancelling Headphones ($278, originally $349.99; amazon.com) Sony obviously isn't new to the soundstage, but its WH-1000XM3 headphones contain the latest and greatest of the brand's listening technology. For starters, these headphones are capable of active noise cancellation, which tunes out environmental sounds and distractions. With an over-ear design and comfortable cushions and headband, these headphones make it easy to get lost in your music, and thanks to 30 hours of battery life, and five hours of playback from just a 10-minute quick charge, you'll rarely have to take them off. Of course, when you do take them off, they fold up for convenient travel. Sony's WH-1000XM3s are also Alexa-enabled, giving you voice control over your music, calls and much more. At the touch of a button, you can activate Alexa, or use some of the other on-device controls. In the box, you'll also receive a carrying case, charging cable and an audio cable for wired listening. So pick up a pair of Sony's WH-1000XM3 headphones in either black or silver while they're on sale, and get ready to hear your music in a whole new way. For more great deals, check out CNN Coupons.  Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
